decks.notes: This Jund aggro deck focuses on sacrificing creatures for value, utilizing cards like Cauldron Familiar and Mayhem Devil to drain the opponent's life total. Witch's Oven and Bloodtithe Harvester help generate tokens and gain life. The deck also includes ways to steal opponents' creatures with Claim the Firstborn and disrupt their game plan with Fatal Push. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds consistency and flexibility to the deck's mana base. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy.

This deck focuses on playing low-cost aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Burning-Tree Emissary to quickly overwhelm the opponent. Cards like Atarka's Command and Monstrous Rage provide additional damage and support, while Play with Fire and Burst Lightning offer direct removal options. The mana base is built around efficiently casting these creatures, with Thornspire Verge and Copperline Gorge helping to ensure consistent plays. Overall, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and close out games swiftly through a combination of efficient creatures and burn spells.

The deck revolves around assembling a powerful combo involving Greasefang and Parhelion II to generate huge advantage while controlling the opponent's board with disruption and removal spells. The key strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, while setting up the combo pieces for a big payoff when they come together. The deck aims to quickly establish board presence and control the game until it can assemble its game-winning combo.
